output: DateRange(postDP(inputLst, current_pos), None) if postDP(inputLst, current_pos) else current
comment: convert 'from' 'since' to a DR without latter DP

output: DateRange(None, postDP(inputLst, current_pos)) if postDP(inputLst, current_pos) else current
comment: convert 'to' 'until' to a DR without former DP

output: DateRange(current.from_DP, postpDR(inputLst, current_pos).to_DP) if postpDR(inputLst, current_pos) else current
comment: if find a DR without latter DP, find the next DR without former DP, and combine them

output: multi(current, -1) if find_last(inputLst, current_pos) else current
multi(current, 1) if find_next(inputLst, current_pos) else current
DateRange(add(DCT, day2year(current)), DCT) if find_year(inputLst, current_pos) else current
DateRange(add(DCT, day2year(multi(current, 10))), DCT) if find_decade(inputLst, current_pos) else current
DateRange(add(DCT, day2year(multi(current, 100))), DCT) if find_centry(inputLst, current_pos) else current
